name: Curried Kidney Beans, Quinoa, Roasted Zucchini, Mango Salsa Bowl
description: Curried Kidney Beans, Quinoa, Roasted Zucchini, Roasted broccoli stems, Mango Salsa Bowl. Easy fridge clean up bowl. vegan gluten-free nut-free soy-free recipe. Can be oil-free
recipeIngredient: 1/2 tsp dried fenugreek leaves or 1/8 tsp fenugreek seeds (optional)
1 15 oz can of kidney beans or 1.5 cups cooked kidney beans
2/3 to 3/4 tsp salt (depends on if the kidney beans were salted)

recipeInstructions.text: For the Curried Kidney Beans: Blend all the ingredients through water and 2 tbsp of the drained kidney beans until smooth. Add blended tomato mixture in a saucepan and cook over medium heat until it thickens slightly about 6 to 7 minutes. Add he kidney beans and salt. Cover and cook over medium heat for 9 to 12 minutes or until the kidney beans can be easily mashed. Taste and adjust salt and spice. Cook longer if the sauce is too thin.
recipeInstructions.name: For the Curried Kidney Beans: Blend all the ingredients through water and 2 tbsp of the drained kidney beans until smooth. Add blended tomato mixture in a saucepan and cook over medium heat until it thickens slightly about 6 to 7 minutes. Add he kidney beans and salt. Cover and cook over medium heat for 9 to 12 minutes or until the kidney beans can be easily mashed. Taste and adjust salt and spice. Cook longer if the sauce is too thin.

recipeInstructions.text: For the Veggies: Roast the zucchini and broccoli stems on a grill pan until roasted to preference with or without oil. Sprinkle salt and garam masala on the veggies once done and keep aside.
recipeInstructions.name: For the Veggies: Roast the zucchini and broccoli stems on a grill pan until roasted to preference with or without oil. Sprinkle salt and garam masala on the veggies once done and keep aside.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the quinoa or other grains.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook the quinoa or other grains.

recipeInstructions.text: Cube the mango and use as is or make salsa with finely chopped red onion, cilantro, jalapeno, lime juice, salt and pepper to taste.
recipeInstructions.name: Cube the mango and use as is or make salsa with finely chopped red onion, cilantro, jalapeno, lime juice, salt and pepper to taste.

recipeInstructions.text: Arrange the bowl with a heaping serving of saucy kidney beans, quinoa or other cooked grain, crunchy lettuce or greens of choice, roasted zucchini and broccoli stems, radish slices and mango/mango salsa. Sprinkle salt, pepper/red pepper flakes, and generous garam masala on the bowl. Add a dash of lemon juice. Serve!
recipeInstructions.name: Arrange the bowl with a heaping serving of saucy kidney beans, quinoa or other cooked grain, crunchy lettuce or greens of choice, roasted zucchini and broccoli stems, radish slices and mango/mango salsa. Sprinkle salt, pepper/red pepper flakes, and generous garam masala on the bowl. Add a dash of lemon juice. Serve!
